original_text: Meanwhile, the people in Judah said, “The strength of the laborers is giving out, and there is so much rubble that we cannot rebuild the wall.”
korean_text: 유다 사람들은 이르기를 흙 무더기가 아직도 많거늘 짐을 나르는 자의 힘이 다 빠졌으니 우리가 성을 건축하지 못하리라 하고

sentences.original_text: Meanwhile, the people in Judah said
The strength of the laborers is giving out
and there is so much rubble
that we cannot rebuild the wall
